definition: the act of furnishing an equivalent person or thing in the place of another
details:
noun
- the act of furnishing an equivalent person or thing in the place of another
= synonyms: replacing
- a person or thing that takes or can take the place of another
= synonyms: substitute
- an event in which one thing is substituted for another
= example: an event in which one thing is substituted for another
= synonyms: transposition
- a person who follows next in order
= synonyms: successor
- someone who takes the place of another person
= synonyms: surrogate, alternate
- filling again by supplying what has been used up
= synonyms: renewal, refilling, replenishment
